result.title: Annual report (2020), and press release about race typing and genotyping of Pst, Pt and Pgt (T1.1)
result.description: Annual report 2020 about changes in P. striiformis, P. triticina and P. graminis populations in Europe. The report will highlight changes of relevance for rust susceptibility of wheat varieties and breeding lines of agronomic importance. The underlying data feeding into the reports will be imported from the online resources in RustWatch, e.g., the WheatRustToolbox.

result.title: Recommendations for coordinated and harmonized wheat rust surveillance in Europe based on input from stakeholders
result.description: This deliverable will identify the most relevant data and protocols from national surveillance activities and recommend coordinated wheat rust surveillance activities in Europe based on input from stakeholders in five case study regions.

category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

result.title: Assessment of rust control in coordinated IPM trials in up to 10 regions -2020.
result.description: M33- In series of field trials, new IPM strategies will be investigated by using cultivation practices, rust resistant varieties, control thresholds, synthetic fungicides and bio-pesticides. The results will be reported each year after the trials have been completed and appropriate analyses of results have been made, allowing adjustments in recommendations for wheat rust control by end-user farmers.

result.title: Patterns of distinct Adult Plant Resistance (APR) to Pst in wheat revealed by microscopic histopathology
result.description: Key Adult Plant Resistances APR to the three rusts will be characterized at the cellular level through the combination of confocal microscopy multispectral imaging and histological methods The developed protocols will be discussed with breeders in the perspective of highthroughput APR screening

result.title: Management, analysis and display of data in RustWatch utilising the Wheat Rust Toolbox. Documentation and user guide
result.description: A documentation and user guide for proper use of the Wheatrust Toolbox will be developed. This will facilitate effective storage, analysis and dissemination of data and information from the project via database driven information systems, web tools and mobile platforms. The WheatRust Toolbox will be the “control centre” of the Wheat Rust early warnig system.

result.title: Annual report (2019) and press release about race typing and genotyping of Pst, Pt and Pgt (T1.1)
result.description: Annual reports about 2018, 2019, 2020 and 2021changes in P. striiformis, P. triticina and P. graminis populations in Europe. The reports will highlight changes of relevance for rust susceptibility of wheat varieties and breeding lines of agronomic importance. The underlying data feeding into the reports will be imported from the online resources in RustWatch, e.g., the WheatRustToolbox

result.title: Annual report (2021), and press release about race typing and genotyping of Pst, Pt and Pgt (T1.1)
result.description: Annual report about 2021changes in P striiformis P triticina and P graminis populations in Europe The reports will highlight changes of relevance for rust susceptibility of wheat varieties and breeding lines of agronomic importance The underlying data feeding into the reports will be imported from the online resources in RustWatch eg the WheatRustToolbox

result.title: Assessment of rust control in coordinated IPM trials in up to 10 regions - 2021.
result.description: M45 In series of field trials new IPM strategies will be investigated by using cultivation practices rust resistant varieties control thresholds synthetic fungicides and biopesticides The results will be reported each year after the trials have been completed and appropriate analyses of results have been made allowing adjustments in recommendations for wheat rust control by enduser farmers
